node.detail_zh: 患者於百德新街一食肆工作，無外遊記錄，沒有病徵，最近上班日期為 9 月 6 日。患者於 9 月 7 日於官涌體育館接受全民檢測，8 日陪同兒子（第 #4918 宗個案患者）到伊利沙伯醫院交回深喉唾液樣本，9 日再陪同兒子到眼科醫院接受手術，於兒子手術期間獲知初步確診。母子二人在 9 月 10 日接受血清抗體測試，結果呈陽性，代表二人可能較早前已受感染。患者與丈夫及兒子居於油麻地廟街，平常多到油麻地街市購物。
node.detail_en: The patient works at a resutrant on Paterson Street, with no travel history and having displayed no symptoms, and last attended work on September 6. She attended the Universial Community Testing Programme at Kwun Chung Sports Centre on September 7, and accompanied her son (patient #4918) to turn in a deep throat saliva sample at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on September 8. She accompanied her son at Hong Kong Eye Hospital who had an operation on September 9, and received notification regarding her diagnosis during his operation. Both of them took a serologic test on September 10 and tested positive, meaning that they may have been infected earlier on. The patient and her husband and son live on Temple Street, Yaumatei, and usually shops at Yau Ma Tei Market.
